_sText:
de\_interruption\_beta
--------------------


Theme:

Counter-Terrorists have transported a number of weaponry and ammunition to a port-side warehouse for distribution. The information was leaked to a group of Terrorists who plans to interrupt the transfer and destroy the goods. Some rare and expensive medicine were also awaiting transport at the scene and became an additional target. 

-------------

This is the third map (second to be publicly released) I have created.

In this map I have examined the use of a night environment, different light styles, and map fog for the first time.

Map comes with NAV (no places names in beta), and level overview / radar overview.


As always, feedback and comments much appreciated. =)

Current to do list:

- [DONE] IMPORTANT - Where on earth is that skybox glitch coming from??!! It's not on my screen!
- Finish soundscaping the map (atm this is only in CT spawn)
- [TESTING] Make bombsite B more interesting (there is a lot of potential for this)
- [DONE] Implement better door movement / unlocking procedure for the doors from the sewers
- [TESTING] Further optimise the map (unlikely)
- [TESTING] Improve office lighting
- [DONE] Widen the stairs, consider additional railings [mmatses]
- Re-consider port-side water being too dirty  [mmatses]
- Flickering light (with sparks and sound) in sewers [Blur.]
- Place vending machine in tea room [Blur.]
- Go through the list as provided by will2k [will2k]
- Consider review from wintermute\*76 [wintermute\*76]


Map Featuring:

- Destroyed wall *NOW WITH GIBS! ([http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5618](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5618 "http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5618"))
- Beautiful Glass Pack ([http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3205](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3205 "http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3205"))
- Rafters - Metal ([http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/2722](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/2722 "http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/2722"))
- Maik's Overlay Sign Pack 1 ([http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2892](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2892 "http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2892"))
- icecreamlock`s ([http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2605](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2605 "http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/2605"))

-------------


Installation instructions:

To install, place contents of this .rar into your "counter-strike source\cstrike\maps" folder. Everything's packed into the .bsp.

Enjoy! =)


OCT 2011, ASTFA`
